## R Markdown

```{r readRDS provided<-TRUE}
precip <- readRDS("USAAnnualPcpn1950_2008.rds")
temp <- readRDS("USAAnnualTemp1950_2008.rds")
```

```{r Remove NA values}
#p for precip and t for temperature
p <- precip[complete.cases(precip), ]
t <- temp[complete.cases(temp), ]
```

```{r Aggregation}
p_agg <- aggregate(year ~ lat+lon+name, p, FUN=length)
t_agg <- aggregate(year ~ lat+lon+name, t, FUN=length)
```

```{r Minimum amout of years}
min = 40
p_agg <- subset(p_agg, year >= min)
t_agg <- subset(t_agg, year >= min)
```

```{r Data for stations left}
p_filt <- merge(p,p_agg, by=c("lat","lon","name"))
t_filt <- merge(t,t_agg, by=c("lat","lon","name"))
```
